title: Aural set, sonata - first vs second section 1

content.description: You will hear a passage from a sonata. The excerpt, which consists of two main sections, will be played three times. Before listening to the excerpt for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: Which element of the first section does NOT return at the beginning of the second section?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in performed music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
